code: export var addPizzaToCart=function addPizzaToCart(pizzaObj){return{type:'ADD_PIZZA_CART',payload:pizzaObj};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:'CLEAR_CART'};};export var removeCartItem=function removeCartItem(id){return{type:'REMOVE_CART_ITEM',payload:id};};export var plusCartItem=function plusCartItem(id){return{type:'PLUS_CART_ITEM',payload:id};};export var minusCartItem=function minusCartItem(id){return{type:'MINUS_CART_ITEM',payload:id};};
